summary: Phase 3 Testing Complete - White-Label Branding & Enhanced Customer Portal features fully functional. Backend API tests: 21/21 passed (100%). Frontend UI tests: All features working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/v1/settings/branding - Returns branding settings with all expected fields
PUT /api/v1/settings/branding - Updates branding settings and persists changes
Branding endpoints require authentication (401 without token)
GET /api/v1/portal/{token}/branding - Returns portal branding (public)
Portal branding returns 404 for invalid token
POST /api/v1/portal/{token}/request-service - Creates service request and lead
Emergency service request creation works
Service request returns 404 for invalid token
GET /api/v1/portal/{token}/messages - Returns customer messages
Messages endpoint returns 404 for invalid token
GET /api/v1/portal/{token}/service-history - Returns service history
Service history returns 404 for invalid token
PUT /api/v1/portal/{token}/profile - Updates customer profile
Profile update returns 404 for invalid token
GET /api/v1/service-requests - Lists service requests (authenticated)
POST /api/v1/service-requests/{id}/convert - Converts service request to job
Service requests endpoint requires authentication
GET /api/v1/portal/{token} - Returns full portal data
Portal data returns 404 for invalid token
GET /api/v1/portal/{token}/invoices - Returns customer invoices
Login with test credentials (owner@radiancehvac.com)
frontend_tests_passed: Settings page loads with all tabs (Company, Branding, Customer Portal, Messaging, Scheduling)
Branding tab shows white-label toggle, color pickers, logo URL, font family selector
Branding preview updates dynamically with color changes
Customer Portal settings tab shows portal title, welcome message, support contact fields
Customer Portal loads with branding colors applied (orange header from tenant branding)
Portal navigation tabs work (Home, Appointments, Invoices, History, Messages)
Request Service dialog opens with issue description, urgency, property, date/time fields
Edit Profile dialog opens with first name, last name, email, phone fields
Quotes Awaiting Response section shows Accept/Decline buttons
Service History tab displays past jobs with status badges
seed_data_creation: Test service requests created with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 3 features (White-Label Branding, Enhanced Customer Portal) are fully functional. Voice AI webhooks are implemented but require Twilio configuration for full testing. All branding and portal endpoints work correctly. Customer portal applies tenant branding colors dynamically. Service requests can be created from portal and converted to jobs by staff.
